Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: â€¢ Hey people! Have you heard the latest buzz? There's talk of a Stage 3 tax cut but it may not be all it's cracked up to be! According to the Australia Institute these cuts are "fiscally irresponsible" and could cost taxpayers over $240 billion in the next ten years. Some folks are angry even urging to scrap the cuts altogether. Meanwhile others are criticizing various politicians for troubling decisions surrounding budgeting and economic advice. Want to join the conversation? Check out the links and hashtags in these opinionated posts!
